sentences.en: Granny is tired, so she's taking her time to walk upstairs.
sentences.cn: 奶奶累了, 所以上楼走得很慢.

sentences.en: Granny prayed and invoked the blessings of God for each of us.
sentences.cn: 姥姥祈祷着,为我们每个人都乞求上帝的保佑.

sentences.en: Granny would prepare a lunch for the all - night praying session.
sentences.cn: 姥姥给通宵祷告的人们打点好便饭.

sentences.en: Have you had any word from granny?
I told Granny that she was not responsible for my soul.
sentences.cn: 我告诉姥姥她不用管我的灵魂.

sentences.en: Let's call in on the old granny for some minutes.
sentences.cn: 我们花几分钟去看看老奶奶吧.

sentences.en: My granny likes eating tinned peaches.
She had walked out and gone to live in Bath with her granny.
sentences.cn: 她离家出走后到巴斯与奶奶同住。

sentences.en: The child skipped along at his granny's side.
sentences.cn: 小孩蹦蹦跳跳地走在奶奶一旁.

sentences.en: The children were all ears when Granny told them stories.
sentences.cn: 奶奶讲故事的时候,孩子们都全神贯注地听着.

sentences.en: The old granny talked endlessly, but we listened to her with great patience.
sentences.cn: 老奶奶叨絮不休, 不过我们还是耐心地听着.

sentences.en: To Granny, I had accomplished a miracle.
sentences.cn: 在姥姥看来, 我是创造了一项奇迹.

phrases.tran_cn: 绿苹果（澳大利亚的一种青绿色苹果）

trans.tran_cn: 奶奶，外婆，婆婆妈妈的人
